DocAttribute.Name: Red
DocAttribute.Documentation: The intensity of the red colour component. > NOTE  The colour component value is given within the range of 0..1, and not within the range of 0..255 as otherwise usual.

DocAttribute.Name: Green
DocAttribute.Documentation: The intensity of the green colour component. > NOTE  The colour component value is given within the range of 0..1, and not within the range of 0..255 as otherwise usual.

DocAttribute.Name: Blue
DocAttribute.Documentation: The intensity of the blue colour component. > NOTE  The colour component value is given within the range of 0..1, and not within the range of 0..255 as otherwise usual.
